original_title: Le jeune cinéma : Godard et ses émules
overview: Influenced and inspired by Jean-Luc Godard, some young french directors (Jean Eustache, Francis Leroi, Jean-Michel Barjol, Romain Goupil, Luc Moullet) are talking about their problems in producing less expensive and more free films in the french industry of cinema of the 60's.

production_companies.name: Office national de radiodiffusion télévision française

title: Young Cinema: Godard and His Emulators
